column1: Born from flames, Salameche commands the scorching heat.
Born of flames, Salameche blazes through the sky.
'"Its fiery passion burns brighter than any flame."'
Born from flames, Salameche blazes a path of destruction.
Born from the flames, a Salameche's spirit burns bright.
Born of flames, Salameche roars with fiery determination.
Born of flames, Salameche roars with fiery might.
